entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard who is the subject of conversation between Voldemort and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, a young wizard who is conversing with Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard mentioned by Voldemort as someone who has not performed certain magic.

relationships.description: Voldemort is conversing with Harry, expressing his skepticism about Harry's claims of having more magic than him.
Voldemort compares himself to Dumbledore, stating that he has performed magic that Dumbledore never dreamed of.
Harry is conversing with Voldemort, responding to his claims and expressing his own confidence in his magical abilities.
